pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed update Project API issue - unexpected changes in some fields like moderators ,contributors, etc

Which issue is this pull request belonging to and how is it solving it? (#1057)
Did you add or update any new dependencies that are required for your change? - No


How To Test?

Have you implemented any additional tests? - Yes, Testcase for Doc

Checklist

 All related issues are referenced in commit messages and in PR

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit jaideep.palit@siemens.com
